## Celebrating 40 Years of Biltmore Wines

Nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Asheville, North Carolina on George Vanderbilt’s magnificent 8,000-acre estate, Biltmore Winery celebrates its 40th Anniversary in 2025.

Visit our Winery and receive an introduction to our distinctive portfolio of multi-award-winning red, white, rosé, and sparkling wines. Our knowledgeable wine hosts welcome the opportunity to guide your selections from 20+ exceptional handcrafted vintages.

[ Visit Winery ](/visit/winery/visit-our-winery/)

## Two Distinctive Wine Experiences

A visit to our Winery invites you to explore another aspect of the Vanderbilt legacy: Biltmore Wines. Two beautifully appointed spaces invite your indulgence: our indoor Tasting Room (where your Complimentary Tasting awaits) and our indoor/outdoor Wine Bar.

###### Savor
